lead_paragraph: Ms. Stein, the Green Party presidential nominee, appeared emboldened as a judge ordered a recount in Michigan and her lawyers made a new case in Pennsylvania.

byline.contributor: Monica Davey and Julie Bosman contributed reporting.

snippet: Ms. Stein, the Green Party presidential nominee, appeared emboldened as a judge ordered a recount in Michigan and her lawyers made a new case in Pennsylvania....
abstract: Green Party presidential nominee Jill Stein presses her case outside Trump Tower for recounts of presidential vote in closely contested states of Michigan, Pennsylvania and Wisconsin, citing concerns about reliability of voting machines; Pres-elect Donald J Trump and his team see recounts as delay tactic, and call Stein's money-raising efforts to continue recount 'scam.'

headline.main: Jill Stein Takes Long-Shot Recount Campaign to Trump Tower
headline.print_headline: Call Rises for Recounts Outside Trump’s Door
